body.name: JYX Wireless Microphone, Dynamic Microphone for Karaoke with Receiver and Anti-Slip Ring, 80ft Transmission Distance, Rechargeable Mic System for Karaoke Night, Meeting, Compere, Party

climatePledgeFriendly.details: ISCC PLUS certified products are created using raw materials like recycled plastics and bio-based materials, which can reduce fossil fuel consumption.

features: Freely Roam - Wireless microphone makes you move freely and do energetic and active performances.80ft receiving distance great for host a party, performances and live shows.

Rechargeable Battery: The rechargeable and portable receiver only needs to charge for about 3-5 hours and can be used for 8-10 hours. The system features rugged construction for dependable performance and long life.
Extensive Use: Stable signal, 80ft operating range (line of sight), suitable for indoor and outdoor activities, such as home karaoke, church, wedding, conference and small stage performance.

Quick Setup: Turn on the system and plug the receiver into the 6.35mm jack, then the receiver will sync the frequency with the transmitter automatically. Wearing the anti-slip ring and have your karaoke party.Please avoid using in a small space, and keep a certain distance from the audio output device to avoid interference noise.
What You Get：1 x wireless microphone, 1 x receiver with a 6.35mm plug, 1 x anti-slip ring , 2x Type-C charging cable, 1 x manual, 2 x AA batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality / excellent customer support
reviews.reviewText: This cordless mic is by far the best I've ever used. Holds a charge for a long time and sounds great. No distortion. High quality sound and as loud as you want it to be. I did have a problem with the receiver not wanting to charge after I had it for a while, but they quickly exchanged the whole system for a new one and I had it within a couple of days... no problem. Great customer service.. great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color me impressed!
reviews.reviewText: I've been exposed to and have used pro audio gear as well as bottom of the barrel equipment. This is no doubt consumer level gear. But I think the sound quality is stellar. This is one of the best sounding mics I've ever used. The only thing that could make it better would be an XLR option and channel selection. This would still be reasonable at 3-4 times the price. 6/5 stars from these tickled ears.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these, however needless to say both using same channel and frequency so the sounds keep jumping from mic 1 to 2, make sure you buy with chqngeable channels or freq. It sounds good but knowing we like to party and karaoke all the time, i need to -3 mic with different frq/ch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't let the price fool you.
reviews.reviewText: Great price works better than some of the more expensive brands I've purchased in the past. As a DJ passing a microphone around the room for toasts it's nice to have a cheap yet high quality alternative. I've used it for a bunch of gigs and it never disappoints. Great battery life and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of these cause they are easy to connect and use, while providing good sound quality. I would use these for zoom meeting and in person presentations, but the only major downflaw is that they dont recharge like they are supposed to. Had this problem with the two that I bought and a replacement mike that was sent to me when i asked for an exhange. I tried many different chargers and outlets. So three different microphones didnt charge and they have a special 5v battery that cant be bought anywhere. Dont get these cause once they die, you arent going to be able to use it anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan that it is made in Chy-Nah but it works pretty good so far
reviews.reviewText: All around a good value for your dollar despite being made in Chy-Nah like everything else.Used forI'm a captain for a local tour boat company here in Florida and was lookin for a wireless solution to our sound system on board our 40ft boat. So far exceeded our expectations. No engine interference and no noise interference. Sound is really clear and enjoyable to listen to even at higher speeds while underway.My only concerns our how long the batteries will last throughout the day and how to charge them up over night as our boat is not plugged into shore power at night.All in all a very good buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Battery live is unacceptable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great buy UPDATED PLZ READ
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE (I had to buy a new one) 6/27/23ok so the one I previously purchased ended up breaking. The button came off and then it was all downhill from there BUT I really liked this mic and it lasted a while so I came back for another one. I was disappointed when I received it and saw that I was sent the same microphone but a completely different receiver and it wouldn’t have been a big issue except the receiver does not work unless it’s plugged in even though it should charge and be used wireless. I will be returning and I guess i’ll have to find another mic next time. Why was the receiver switched to a cheap off brand from its original?NEW UPDATE: It’s been over a YEAR and this mic is still going strong despite being dropped multiple times OOOPS lol Still a Great Buy!EDIT: Its been over a month and still works great!I've used this microphone over the weekend to see how it does and this is my honest review. I am a DJ and I need to have reliable equipment so I was skeptical about buying this item but glad I did. It connects soon as you turn it on and I can walk all over the club with no reception issues or distortion. I charged it as soon as I unboxed and the charge lasted multiple nights I turned the mic off whrn I wasnt talking of course, will try to remember to update this review after a month or so. I DJ every week so let's see how this holds up.
Came with 2 3.7 volt batteries awesome sound can't change channels otherwise great

Teenager ist glücklich. Hat das Mikrophone heut zum Nikolaus bekommen und gerade, trotz krank im Bett liegend, seine wahre Freude daran. Hab das ganze an eine JBL Partybox 310 angeschlossen und nach ein wenig Fummeln und Einstellungen suchen und finden (bin Mikrofon-Neuling und hatte sowas heute zum ersten Mal in der Hand) funzt das Ganze jetzt ohne Probleme, ohne Rückkopplung und irgendwelche seltsamen Quietsch-Fiep-Geräusche. Tonqualität scheint okay zu sein, ich kann das aber nicht wirklich beurteilen, da ich meinen Pubertier jetzt ni unbedingt raten würde sich bei DSDS zu bewerben.

reviews.reviewTitle: Suena bien y lo más importante que se carga como un teléfono
reviews.reviewText: Lo que más me ha gustado lo fácil que es la calidad de sonido que tiene para su precio y que se carga como un teléfono ambas partes te preocupa de pilitas por fin
Très bon micro pour le prix, la qualité est bonne et la réception se fait d’assez loin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to set up and is good quality for money
reviews.reviewText: This I was skeptic at first but upon receiving my item it was of good sturdy quality and felt heavy in the hand and clear as day when I am mixing on my decks just what I needed awesome!
